parameter_label.name: ATP Concentration
parameter_label.description: Concentration of ATP in solution.

parameter_label.name: ADP Concentration
parameter_label.description: Concentration of ADP in solution.

parameter_label.name: Initial ATP Concentration
parameter_label.description: Initial concentration of ATP in solution.

parameter_label.name: Initial ADP Concentration
parameter_label.description: Initial concentration of ADP in solution.

parameter_label.name: Initial Pi Concentration
parameter_label.description: Initial concentration of phosphate in solution.

parameter_label.name: Cleavage Rate
parameter_label.description: Rate of phosphate cleavage.

parameter_label.name: Release Rate
parameter_label.description: Rate of phosphate release.

parameter_label.name: Barbed ATP Polymerization Rate
parameter_label.description: Rate of ATP polymerization at barbed end.

parameter_label.name: Barbed ADP Polymerization Rate
parameter_label.description: Rate of ADP polymerization at barbed end.

parameter_label.name: Barbed ADP-Pi Polymerization Rate
parameter_label.description: Rate of ADP-Pi polymerization at barbed end.

parameter_label.name: Pointed ATP Polymerization Rate
parameter_label.description: Rate of ATP polymerization at pointed end.

parameter_label.name: Pointed ADP Polymerization Rate
parameter_label.description: Rate of ADP polymerization at pointed end.

parameter_label.name: Pointed ADP-Pi Polymerization Rate
parameter_label.description: Rate of ADP-Pi polymerization at pointed end.

parameter_label.name: Barbed ATP Depolymerization Rate
parameter_label.description: Rate of ATP depolymerization at barbed end.

parameter_label.name: Barbed ADP Depolymerization Rate
parameter_label.description: Rate of ADP depolymerization at barbed end.

parameter_label.name: Barbed ADP-Pi Depolymerization Rate
parameter_label.description: Rate of ADP-Pi depolymerization at barbed end.

parameter_label.name: Pointed ATP Depolymerization Rate
parameter_label.description: Rate of ATP depolymerization at pointed end.

parameter_label.name: Pointed ADP Depolymerization Rate
parameter_label.description: Rate of ADP depolymerization at pointed end.

parameter_label.name: Pointed ADP-Pi Depolymerization Rate
parameter_label.description: Rate of ADP-Pi depolymerization at pointed end.

parameter_label.name: Initial Strand Length
parameter_label.description: Initial length of the strand.

parameter_label.name: Simulation Duration
parameter_label.description: Time to run the simulation.

parameter_label.name: Filament Tip Concentration
parameter_label.description: Concentration of filaments.
